name: BNNSFilterParameters
desc: A structure that contains common filter parameters.

items.name: init(options: BNNSFlags, threadCount: Int, allocator: BNNSAlloc?, deallocator: BNNSFree?)
items.desc: Returns a new common filter parameters structure using the specified options.

items.name: init(flags: UInt32, n_threads: Int, alloc_memory: BNNSAlloc?, free_memory: BNNSFree?)
items.desc: Returns a new common filter parameters structure.

items.name: var flags: UInt32
items.desc: A logical OR of zero or more values from BNNS flags.

items.name: var n_threads: Int
items.desc: The number of worker threads to execute.

items.name: var alloc_memory: BNNSAlloc?
items.desc: The function called to allocate memory.

items.name: var free_memory: BNNSFree?
items.desc: The function called to deallocate memory.

items.name: struct BNNSFlags
items.desc: Options that control the behavior of a filter parameter.
